segments.text: Did you clean your room today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , when were you planning on doing that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to clean it up later .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Didn't I ask you to clean it up earlier ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want you to vacuum in your room , and don't forget to dust everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make sure you clean it up before you do anything else .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not going anywhere until later , so I'll clean it then .
segments.speaker: S2
